messages.title: This is our change to get real change
messages.content: Millions of people have been betrayed by Jeremy Corbyn's support for a divisive hard Brexit. Even lifelong Labour supporters are feeling let down by a Labour Party that has abandoned its values and backed a damaging hard Brexit. At this election, the choice is stark - and the Liberal Democrats are your only chance to stand up against an extreme Brexit. The Liberal Democrats are the only party with the strength to respond to the challenges ahead.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight to keep Britain in the single market
Be an effective opposition to the Conservatives
Change the direction of the country

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats are your only chance to stand up against an extreme Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Lib Dems hope to gain dozens of seats with anti-Brexit campaign. Brexit has strengthened the Lib Dems and further weakened Labour. The Liberal Democrats are the only party with the strength to respond to the challenges ahead.

quotes.text: Lib Dems hope to gain dozens of seats with anti-Brexit campaign.
The Liberal Democrats have raised about £500,000 in small online donations since the election was announced.
Brexit has strengthened the Lib Dems and further weakened Labour.
Labour MPs are deeply split over Brexit and more than 1,000 of their members have signed up to the Liberal Democrats since Article 50 was triggered.
Many disillusioned Labour supporters went to the Liberal Democrats in opposition to the Iraq War. The same might happen over Brexit.
Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.
Jeremy Corbyn has betrayed us over Brexit. The truth is now clear: he is unfit to be elected leader of the opposition.

images.caption: Tim Farron and the Liberal Democrats are the only party that aims to keep Britain in the single market.
Jeremy Corbyn ordered MPs to back a hard Brexit.
